p: Methanol extract has analgesic, non-inflammatory and venotonic impacts with hemorrhoids, non-inflammatory activity attributable to flavonoids and β-sitosterol. β-sitosterol in methanol extract does have the potential to reduce MPO enzymes. This indicate a significant decrease in the influx of neutrophils into the inflamed tissue. Ethanol extract has beneficial effect on neutrophils triggered by aspirin-induced tissue damage in rats [ 17].
